          <title>
            <string language="sl">Uho - trditve</string>
            <string language="en">Ear - statements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ohr - Anweisungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oreille - rapports</string>

          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ugotavljanje pravilnosti trditev povezanih z ušesom.</string>
            <string language="en">Determining the correctness of statements related to the ear.</string>

          </description>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinar a exatidão das indicações

          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθοριστικός την ακρίβεια των δηλώσεων σχετικών με το

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinando la corrección de las declaraciones
